SamPy.smnIO.read.GFBasicData¶

SamPy.smnIO.read.GFBasicData(path)¶

Reads Rachel’s SAMs output data. If AB = True then the function converts Johnson U, B, V, and K bands to Vega system.

Note :

This is really ineffective way of reading in data and should be used only when a rather small simulation is being processed.
Parameters:
  • path (string) – path in which the files are located
  • AB (boolean) – whether Johnson U, B, V, and K bands are converted to Vega system or not.
